metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8105 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/js/app.js in Roundcubewebmail before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.3 allows remote authenticatedusers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the file name in adrag-n-drop file upload.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.3+dfsg.1-1').
